entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
